value.title: Turnbull’s AI robotics bet taps investors for blockbuster raising
value.excerpt: AI robotics innovator Advanced Navigation has had no trouble finding its path to market. The company, which counts former Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull as a director, is tapping investors this month to raise between $80 million and $135 million and is expected to have no trouble getting the raise away.

value.title: Recruitment Platform Expertia AI Raises $1.2 Million In Seed Funding

value.title: Palestinians clash with Israeli police at Jerusalem holy site
value.excerpt: Israeli police confronted hundreds of Palestinians injuring many during the altercation outside one of the city’s holiest sites. The clashes erupting during the convergence of Ramadan, Easter and Passover are sparking fears the country will spiral into more violence.

value.title: Congressional candidate Greg Raths' website copied from Lindsey Graham's campaign site nearly word-for-word
value.excerpt: The website for California House GOP candidate Greg Raths copies excerpts from Sen. Lindsey Graham's 2020 campaign website nearly word-for-word in several places.

value.title: At Least 150 Injured in Clashes at Jerusalem Holy Site
value.excerpt: Israeli police said young masked men used fireworks, stones and other heavy objects to attack security forces around Al Aqsa mosque.

value.title: Cerebras' wafer-size AI chips play nice with PyTorch, TensorFlow

value.title: Qualcomm Touts Eight AI “Firsts”
value.excerpt: The AI research group at Qualcomm Technologies has pioneered innovations from on-device learning to wireless AI, and has ambitious plans for the next set of “firsts”.

value.title: The Census Is Broken. Can AI Fix It?
value.excerpt: Machine learning can help count people to deliver government funding and decide political representation, but the technology still makes mistakes.

value.title: From autonomous cars to autonomous weapons, the AI ethics issues can't be ignored
value.excerpt: Autonomous technology is racing towards us. But whether its autonomous cars or autonomous weapons, there are serious questions. This is where AI ethics comes to a head.

value.title: Meta's A.I. exodus: Top talent quits as the lab tries to keep pace with rivals
value.excerpt: Facebook parent Meta has lost some top artificial intelligence scientists in recent weeks as the company continues with its pivot toward the metaverse.

value.title: AI could be used to generate more biographies of women on Wikipedia

value.title: 7 Virtual Reality Stocks Bringing Web 3.0 to Life
value.excerpt: In case you didn’t know already, virtual reality stocks are stocks that are related to the virtual reality industry. They can be companies that produce VR headsets, software, or content. Overall, the gaming industry and the ability to explore a construct without boundaries via immersive VR experiences will be one of the driving forces behind the increase in VR adoption.

value.title: Programming languages: Python just got a boost from Facebook's Meta
value.excerpt: Meta, which owns Facebook, has given $300,00 to the Python Software Foundation (PSF), the group that maintains Core Python (CPython) – the open-source programming language that powers most machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence apps.

value.title: Companies are commercializing multimodal AI models to analyze videos and more
value.excerpt: Multimodal AI systems, which can understand the relationships between video, text, audio, and more, are becoming commercialized.
